alert.note: Alert for Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:05AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT FOR MERCER...NORTH CENTRAL BURLINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN SOMERSET... SOUTHWESTERN MIDDLESEX AND SOUTHEASTERN BUCKS COUNTIES... At 604 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tullytown, or near Trenton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Ewing, Princeton, Florence, Hightstown, Bordentown, Pennington, Yardley, Tullytown, Langhorne, Windsor, Florence-Roebling, Plainsboro Center, Woodside, Edinburg, White Horse, Twin Rivers, Mercerville-Hamilton Square, Levittown and Lawrenceville. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike exit 6A and near exit 8A. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 6. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 57 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
